  • MailerIdProvisioner

Class MailerIdProvisioner

Certificate provisioner is an object that can do all MailerId's provisioning requests. Provisioning is done for given user id, and is performed at service location, identified by a given uri.

  • ServiceUser
    • MailerIdProvisioner

Methods

Private getCertificates

  • getCertificates(pkey: JsonKey, duration: number): Promise<void>
    • Defined in lib-client/mailer-id/provisioner.ts:70

    Parameters

    • pkey: JsonKey

      is a public key, that needs to be certified.

    • duration: number

      is a desired duration of certificate's validity. Server may provide shorter duration, if asked duration is too long for its security policy.

    Returns Promise<void>

    a promise, resolvable to a string with certificate, generated by the MailerId server.
